attrs.name: tab-style
attrs.desc: Label page style; The optional value of this attribute is card / border-card

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: with-add
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: with-close
attrs.desc: Whether the tag can be closed; Whether the tag can be closed
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: editable
attrs.desc: Whether tags can be added and disabled at the same time
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: show-more-tabs
attrs.desc: When the width of a tab page exceeds a specified value, more tabs are displayed. When you hover the cursor to more tabs, the tab page that exceeds the width is displayed.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Bound value, which is the name of the selected tab.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is the name of the first tab.

attrs.name: position
attrs.desc: Location of the tab; The optional values for this property are top/right/bottom/left
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is top.

attrs.name: stretch
attrs.desc: Whether the label width is self-expanded
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: before-leave
attrs.desc: The hook before the tag is switched. If false is returned or Promise is returned and rejected, the switch is blocked.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Sets the tab page size. This attribute is valid only when tabStyle is set to card or border-card. The value of this attribute can be small.

events.name: add
events.desc: This event is triggered when a tab item is added. Click the Add button on the tabs. No arguments

events.name: click
events.desc: This event is triggered when a tabitem is clicked. Triggered when a tab is selected. arguments: arg1:VueComponent Click the compent object information of the tab, arg2:event

events.name: close
events.desc: This event is triggered when a tab item is deleted. This event is triggered after the tab removal button is clicked. arguments: arg1: name of the deleted tab

events.name: edit
events.desc: This event is triggered when you click the new button of a tab or the tab is closed. arguments: arg1:null or name of the deleted tab, arg2:'add' or'remove'
